title: When do placements and internships happen?
content:
I had a few doubts.

1)when do companies approach for internships. Does it happen at the end of 4th sem during summer holidays or at the end of 6th sem? And when do most people take internships?

2)When do majority  of companies start approaching for placements? I have heard it happens at the end of 6th sem? Am i right?

comments.body: For summer internships after 3rd year companies start coming from the 2nd-3rd week of your 3rd yr.
